import React from 'react'; import { Building2, Users, IndianRupee, Flag, Clock, Briefcase } from 'lucide-react'; import './JobCard.css'; const JobCard = ({ companyName, companyLogo, jobPosition, hiringCount, monthlySalary, jobType, workType, location, skillsRequired, remote, }) => { console.log({ companyName, companyLogo, role, hiringCount, salary, country, workType, jobType, skills, }); const skills = skillsRequired.split(','); // Assuming skills are comma-separated return (

{jobPosition}

{hiringCount}
₹{monthlySalary}
{workType}
{jobType}
{location}

Skills Required

{skills.map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}
); }; export default JobCard;
